response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and we aim to make this transaction as favorable as possible for both parties.

We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is valid for a limited time and represents a significant savings compared to our standard pricing. We are confident that by accepting this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also enjoy a favorable financial outcome.

Should you choose to accept this offer, please let us know, and we will proceed with the necessary arrangements. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
